subTitle: We answer all your questions about our products and services.

faqs.question: What types of wood do you offer?
faqs.answer: At Cheaper Buy, we offer a wide variety of wood, including parquet, tongue-and-groove, beams, door frames, and more. All our wood is high-quality and 100% Peruvian.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we export our wood to the U.S., Canada, and Mexico. If you would like to place an order outside these countries, contact us, and we will evaluate the best shipping option for you.

faqs.question: How can I request a quote?
faqs.answer: You can request a quote directly through our WhatsApp or by filling out our contact form on the website. We will respond as soon as possible.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for bulk purchases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have special pricing for large-volume purchases. Tell us your needs, and we will provide a personalized quote with the best discounts.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery time varies depending on location and order volume. For shipments within Peru, the estimated time is 3 to 7 business days. For exports, it depends on the destination and customs logistics.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept payments via bank transfers, deposits, and WhatsApp payments. If you have a specific payment method in mind, contact us to explore options.
